Content: Years ago, I paid for the “Premium” version.  One one-time payment was supposed to indefinitely get me an ad-free experience using this app, with all the top-of-the line features.  Now, I'm getting ads, and features are being stripped away, unless I subscribe to an ongoing $2/month or $20/year plan.  This amounts to fraud, as I am now being deprived of features that I paid for.
App Name: AccuWeather: Weather Alerts & Live Storm Radar
Strongest Sub-Dimension Definition: The app's ability to quickly alert users when they receive an emergency notification.
